holidays.title: National Pastry Day
holidays.description: We don’t know about you, but we’ve never met a pastry we didn’t like.

holidays.title: Christmas Card Day
holidays.description: ’Tis the season for spreading cheer and joyful greetings cards!

holidays.title: Genocide Prevention Day
holidays.description: Raise your voice and join the global community in the fight against genocide.

holidays.title: International Anti-Corruption Day
holidays.description: It is time to take a stance against corruption.

holidays.title: International Day of Commemoration and Dignity of the Victims of the Crime of Genocide and of the Prevention of this Crime
holidays.description: Raise your fist in remembrance of genocide victims and pledge to stand against future violations.

holidays.title: International Day of Veterinary Medicine
holidays.description: Say thank you to the doctors who keep your precious pets healthy and happy.

holidays.title: Lost and Found Day
holidays.description: Ring up your sister and ask for the pair of jeans she “borrowed” on one occasion.

holidays.title: MS Ireland Christmas Jumper Day
holidays.description: Let's try our best to improve the quality of life for children around the globe.

holidays.title: National Blake Day
holidays.description: Join us as we cheer these solid, methodological personalities who are such an inspiration to know.

holidays.title: National Llama Day
holidays.description: The perfect day to appreciate one of the fuzziest farm animals around.

holidays.title: Tanzania Independence Day
holidays.description: Wish a Tanzanian “Happy Independence Day” in Swahili by saying “Heri ya Siku ya Uhuru”.

holidays.title: Techno Day
holidays.description: Get your dancing shoes on as we celebrate one of the world’s most exhilarating genres of music.

holidays.title: V.C. Bird Day
holidays.description: Like so many great politicians, Bird’s career was forged in the flames of adversity.

holidays.title: Weary Willie Day
holidays.description: If you’re wary of happy clowns for just being happy, this is the day for you.

holidays.title: Angela Deem’s Birthday
holidays.description: She became the subject of many conversations since her first outing on '90-Day Fiance.'

holidays.title: Booba’s Birthday
holidays.description: From gold and platinum to double platinum discs, Booba has them all.

holidays.title: Donny Osmond’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented singer, television actor, and host has become a household name in America.

holidays.title: Grace Hopper’s Birthday
holidays.description: The highly celebrated developer and rear admiral led the charge for a brighter future.

holidays.title: Isaiah Russell-Bailey’s Birthday
holidays.description: This teenage actor, model, and parkour artist has a very promising career ahead of him.

holidays.title: Jaida Essence Hall’s Birthday
holidays.description: Just watching this television personality do her thing can make anyone’s day.

holidays.title: Judi Dench’s Birthday
holidays.description: She has made her mark on the industry with her iconic performances.

holidays.title: Kendall Vertes’s Birthday
holidays.description: Vertes is building quite a portfolio for herself, and may soon appear in blockbuster movies.

holidays.title: Kenneth Pabon’s Birthday
holidays.description: The self-proclaimed "icon in N.Y.C." has a bright future ahead of himself.

holidays.title: Kirk Douglas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Find out more about this actor of Hollywood’s Golden Age, author, and philanthropist.

holidays.title: Kountry Wayne’s Birthday
holidays.description: A rapper turned comedian, Kountry Wayne successfully entertains the audience with his content.

holidays.title: Kwadwo Asamoah’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is an exceptional footballer who represents and makes his country proud.

holidays.title: Lily Pebbles’s Birthday
holidays.description: She partnered with Anna Newton, an award-winning content writer, to launch the "At Home With" Podcast.

holidays.title: Lori Greiner’s Birthday
holidays.description: From entrepreneur, to investor, to all-around boss babe, Greiner has done it all.

holidays.title: Minho’s Birthday
holidays.description: We’ve found out everything you could possibly want to know about Minho.

holidays.title: NI-KI’s Birthday
holidays.description: We’re here to give you a recap on Ni-ki’s life, as you celebrate his birthday.

holidays.title: PnB Rock’s Birthday
holidays.description: We’ve got all the details you could possibly want about this insanely awesome rapper.

holidays.title: Redd Foxx’s Birthday
holidays.description: See how many people Redd Foxx impacted and how his work has meaning, even today.
